card.text: Vigilance When Coiling Omnivore enters, put a +1/+1 counter on it for each creature in your ecosystem. When you do, Coiling Omnivore fights up to one target creature you don’t control. (Your ecosystem consists of any number of creatures with different powers.)

card.name: Cerebral Parasite
card.text: When Cerebral Parasite enters, target opponent reveals a number of cards from their hand equal to the number of creatures in your ecosystem. You choose one of those cards. That player discards that card. (Your ecosystem consists of any number of creatures with different powers.)

card.name: Detritus Hoarder
card.text: First strike Whenever Detritus Hoarder deals combat damage to a player or battle, create a tapped Treasure token. {1}: Detritus Hoarder gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Overgrown Rustshell
card.text: {T}: Add {G} for each creature in your ecosystem. (Your ecosystem consists of any number of creatures with different powers.)

card.name: Mutagenic Orb
card.text: Mutagenic Orb enters with a +1/+1 counter on it. Whenever you attack, distribute any number of counters from Mutagenic Orb among any number of attacking creatures. Attacking creatures without lineage gain lineage until end of turn. (When a permanent with lineage dies, distribute its counters among other permanents you control.)

card.name: Razortooth Hellion
card.text: Trample 3R, Discard a card: Draw a card and put a +1/+1 counter on Razortooth Hellion.

card.name: Tantalizing Dreadfruit
card.text: Whenever Tantalizing Dreadfruit attacks, if it has a deathtouch counter on it, it must be blocked this turn if able. Otherwise, put a deathtouch counter on it. Lineage (When this creature dies, distribute its counters among other permanents you control.)

card.name: Archipelago Drake
card.text: Flying When Archipelago Drake enters, draw a card.

card.name: Converted Terraformer
card.text: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature you control with a counter on it. 3G: Put a +1/+1 counter on target land you control. If it isn’t a creature, it becomes a 3/3 Elemental creature with haste until end of turn. It’s still a land.

card.name: Ocean Purifier
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, if you control four or more untapped lands, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.

card.name: Segment Prospector
card.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Segment Collapse
card.text: Destroy target land. Its controller sacrifices any number of nonland permanents, then Segment Collapse deals 2 damage to that player for each nonland permanent they control.

card.name: Distant Oasis
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {T}, Exile a card from your graveyard: Add one mana of any of the exiled card’s colors or any color that card could produce.

card.name: Violent Predation
card.text: (As a Niche enters, choose an opponent to protect it. Only you can attack it. When it’s defeated, transform it, then attach it to a creature that dealt damage to it this turn if able.) When Violent Predation enters, target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don’t control. --- (Back): Jagged Fangs

card.name: Jagged Fangs
card.text: (If an Adaptation isn’t attached to a creature, you may attach it to a creature you control as a sorcery.) Whenever adapted creature attacks, double its power until end of turn. --- (Front): Violent Predation

card.name: Canopy Grazing
card.text: (As a Niche enters, choose an opponent to protect it. Only you can attack it. When it’s defeated, transform it, then attach it to a creature that dealt damage to it this turn if able.) When Canopy Grazing enters, search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. --- (Back): Immense Size

card.name: Immense Size
card.text: (If an Adaptation isn’t attached to a creature, you may attach it to a creature you control as a sorcery.) Adapted creature gets +2/+2. Whenever a land you control enters, put your choice of a +1/+1 counter or a trample counter on adapted creature. --- (Front): Canopy Grazing

card.name: Carrion Scrounging
card.text: (As a Niche enters, choose an opponent to protect it. Only you can attack it. When it’s defeated, transform it, then attach it to a creature that dealt damage to it this turn if able.) When Carrion Scrounging enters, each opponent sacrifices a creature. --- (Back): Hardy Gut

card.text: (If an Adaptation isn’t attached to a creature, you may attach it to a creature you control as a sorcery.) At the beginning of your end step, you may exile target permanent card from a graveyard. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on adapted creature and you gain 1 life. --- (Front): Carrion Scrounging

card.name: Eerie Stillness
card.text: When Eerie Stillness enters, draw a card. Whenever you attack, if Eerie Stillness didn’t enter this turn, return it to its owner’s hand. Whenever an opponent attacks, sacrifice Eerie Stillness and that player sacrifices an attacking creature.
